-- | Tree type and show functions for lab assignment of University of Twente. Contains RoseTree and RedBlackTree
--   
@package twentefp-eventloop-trees
@version 0.1.1.0

module FPPrac.Trees
data RoseTree :: *
RoseNode :: String -> [RoseTree] -> RoseTree
data RBTree :: *
RBNode :: NodeColor -> String -> [RBTree] -> RBTree
data NodeColor :: *
NodeRed :: NodeColor
NodeBlack :: NodeColor
NodeGrey :: NodeColor
rbExampleTree :: RBTree
roseExampleTree :: RoseTree
showRBTree :: RBTree -> IO ()
showRBTreeList :: [RBTree] -> IO ()
showRoseTree :: RoseTree -> IO ()
showRoseTreeList :: [RoseTree] -> IO ()
showTree :: GeneralizeTree a => a -> IO ()
showTreeList :: GeneralizeTree a => [a] -> IO ()
instance Eq ProgramState
instance Show ProgramState
